trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around November 8th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the way back from the deer stand on my john deere gator. i was just about back to the house when i looked over the tank. there was a bright orange light. stopped thinking there has never been a light there before. looked through my binoculars and could tell it was slowly moving through trees. noticed another light and it was moving. freaked out. called 911
